Hello World Message in Different Formats
=========================================

1. ASCII Binary (8-bit):
01001000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111 00100000 01010111 01101111 01110010 01101100 01100100

2. Hexadecimal (Machine Code representation):
48 65 6C 6C 6F 20 57 6F 72 6C 64

3. Raw Binary (continuous):
010010000110010101101100011011000110111100100000010101110110111101110010011011000110010000001010

4. Octal:
110 145 154 154 157 040 127 157 162 154 144

Decoded Message: Hello World
